PortalDelegablePermissionSet.name: PortalDelegablePermissionSet
PortalDelegablePermissionSet.description: PortalDelegablePermissionSet is a base platform object used to store permission sets that can be assigned by a delegated portal/external user admin (DPUA) to portal users.

DeveloperName.description: Required. The unique string used to identify the record.

Language.description: The language used in the org.

MasterLabel.description: Required. The unique string to identify the record.

PermissionSetId.description: The unique ID of the permission set the DPUA profile can assign to other portal users.

ProfileId.description: The ID of the DPUA profile.
